content.rendered:
Luxe is proud to introduce Davines’ latest styling collection, Your Hair Assistant. Being one of the first salon’s in the country to showcase the collection, the team is excited to share the new era of blow-drying with our clients.

Inspired by award winning hairdresser, Angelo Seminara, Your Hair Assistant is the answer to your dream of having state of the art blow-dried hair on a daily basis.

When used by your hairdresser, the products are an essential tool to create perfectly blow-dried hair, whereas at home, they make blow-drying easier, allowing you to obtain any kind of look with long-lasting results.

Visit us in the salon to try out and learn more about this incredible range or book in with your stylist to experience the in-salon transformation Your Hair Assistant can offer.
